item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1142; 03:57PM; 3767 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lrK74E; Exposition Park; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 14 minutes with no injuries reported. The firefighter's quick work contained the fire to contents of the building and prevented spread into the framing of the structure. The building type is updated to a commercial building (as opposed to strip mall) that appears to be vacant. No further details.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 RA66 SQ21 T15 T26; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1142; 03:43PM; 3767 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lrK74E; Exposition Park; One story strip mall with moderate smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 T15 T26; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Sinking Boat; INC#0996; 02:24PM; Berth 202 Spd Slip E9; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ooRb4o; Wilmington; Firefighters report an approximately 30' powered vessel taking on about 3' of water (at the berth). The owner is on scene and there are no reported injuries. Crews are deploying a pump to help remove water and mitigate the hazard. Two LAFD boats are handling and there are no further details/updates expected.; FS 49; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT3 BT4 E112 E238 E49 T38; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0371; 08:45AM; 4625 S Stoner Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3z0d9j7; Del Rey; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. Building type is updated to two story townhomes. Firefighters contained the fire to the first floor of one unit, defending the adjoining unit from the fire. A primary and secondary search of the unit found no occupants. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E292 E295 E5 E62 RA43 RA62 T5 T92 T95; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0371; 08:29AM; 4625 S Stoner Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3z0d9j7; Del Rey; Two story units, garden-style apartment building with fire in one unit on the first floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There is at least one additional unit exposed (Delta side).; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E292 E295 E5 E62 RA43 RA62 T5 T92 T95; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic; INC#0844; 01:42PM; 1 World Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3v7KmIa; Westchester; After conducting the triage operation, firefighters determined there were a total of 23 passengers plus the driver on board. Two patients were transported in *at least* serious condition and seven patients were transported with minor, non-life threatening injuries. (no further patient information available) There was no entrapment and no fire hazard. All patients were onboard the shuttle, no one on the ground was injured. Any questions regarding the circumstances of the collision are referred to LAWA and LAPD. LA County Fire and El Segundo Fire also responded. ; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 CM20 CM22 E205 E295 E51 E67 EM11 EM13 EM14 EM9 PI1 RA43 RA5 RA51 RA62 RA63 RA71 RA809 RA810 RA814 RA815 RA826 RA846 RA867 RA894 T5 T95; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#0844; 12:21PM; 1 World Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3v7KmIa; Westchester; A shuttle bus at LAX (exact ownership of the shuttle undetermined at this time) involved in a traffic collision. Initial reports of 30 persons on board and the majority of those did not sustain any injuries. There are two patients in *at least* serious condition. Firefighters are conducting a triage operation to determine the total number of patients and the extent of injuries (transports needed). Any LAX specific questions are referred to LAWA. ; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E295 E51 E67 EM11 EM13 EM14 EM9 RA43 RA5 RA51 RA62 RA63 RA71 RA809 RA810 RA814 RA815 RA826 RA846 RA867 RA894 T5 T95; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0802; 11:53AM; 15800 W Bailey Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PPPvgd; outside city; Initial report of one acre of brush burning at the top of the ridge (near a shooting range). There are no structures threatened. This incident is in the jurisdiction of Angeles National Forest (within the Mutual Threat Zone) and LAFD is on scene as an assisting agency. Any further questions are referred to ANF follow @Angeles_NF ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC12 BC15 CW3A CW3B E18 E275 E287 E289 E298 E77 E8139 E8140 E89 E91 EM12 H1 H4 H6 HA1 HA4 HA6 RA18 T75 T87 T89 T98; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0239; 05:34AM; 500 W Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B3j35P; #VermontVista; *Corrected Address* LAFD arrived to find a 3,600 sq-ft commercial building erected in 1986 with heavy fire showing. Firefighters engaged in defensive operations, setting up ladder pipes and exterior hose lines, and established a "collapse zone" around the building (in case walls fell outward). There was, indeed, a collapse. Three firefighters were injured from debris that flew beyond the established collapse zone. Thankfully, two firefighters were evaluated and returned to work on the fire line. One firefighter, with a non-life threatening injury, was transported to the hospital for evaluation. It took 89 firefighters 42 minutes to extinguish the flames. LAFD Heavy Equipment is responding to assist with moving debris and locating smoldering materials underneath. The cause of the fire is under active investigation. ; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM20 CM22 E10 E15 E205 E21 E210 E215 E221 E233 E264 E266 E33 E5 E57 E64 E66 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HE1 HR3 RA257 RA264 RA5 RA57 RA857 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T33 T5 T64 T66 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange
